meaning: a.绝对的，完全的;无(条件)限制的
example_sentence: She has absolute confidence in her ability to succeed.>"
She suffered emotional abuse from her partner, and finally decided to leave the toxic relationship.>"
After living in the hot desert for a month, I finally acclimated to the high temperatures.>"
Tom decided to go on the trip, albeit he was a bit hesitant at first.>"
Be alert when crossing the street.>"

meaning: n.交易;物美价廉的东西；v.讨价还价
example_sentence: I got this shirt for a bargain at the thrift store yesterday.
Before he passed away, my grandfather told me he would bequeath me his old record collection.
He bolted out of the door as soon as the bell rang.>"

meaning: v.要求或索;要n.声称拥有的权力
example_sentence: She claimed that she didn't receive the package, but it was actually delivered yesterday.>"
The sink is clogged with hair, I need to unclog it.>"
Her constant complaining about the weather is starting to annoy me.>"

meaning: n.同等物，坐标；v.使各部分协调;a.同等的
example_sentence: Can you coordinate with your team members to ensure everyone is on the same page?>"
She's trying to cozen her way into getting free drinks at the bar.>"

meaning: n.建筑物的正面；(虚伪)外表
example_sentence: The restaurant had a beautiful facade with colorful lights and large windows.>"
She fastened her seatbelt before starting the car.>"
She cast a furtive glance around the room to make sure no one was watching her>.
Hearing a fusillade of fireworks outside, the dog started barking loudly.>"

meaning: n.岛国状态，岛屿生活状况，与外界隔绝的生活状况；(思想,观点等的)偏狭，性僵化
example_sentence: Their insularity often makes them unaware of global issues.>"
I prefer using unscented detergent for my laundry because I don't like strong smells on my clothes.
